author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
After the discovering the fork of Waydroid called Lepton, I expected to see a FEX fork, well it turns out there's no need for a fork because Valve has literally been bankrolling the project from the start and has the founder on there payroll.
